name: Vampire Slayer
Start point: Morgan in his house in Draynor Village.
Description: Count Draynor is terrorizing the small village of Draynor. The townsfolk want you to kill this vampire.

Items required: Beer (can be bought during the quest for 2 coins)

Recommended: Combat level sufficient to defeat Count Draynor (level 34)

substeps: Speak to Morgan in his house in Draynor Village. Agree to help.
Search the cupboard to find Garlic.
Travel to the Blue Moon Inn (formerly Jolly Boar Inn) located north-east of Varrock, just south of the east bank.
Speak to Dr Harlow inside the Inn.
Buy a Beer from the Bartender (cost: 2 coins).
Give the Beer to Dr Harlow. He will give you a Stake and tell you how to defeat the Count.
Ensure you have the Stake, a Hammer, and the Garlic in your inventory.
Go to Draynor Manor, north of Draynor Village.
Enter the Manor and go down the stairs into the basement.
Open the coffin in the centre of the basement room.
Count Draynor (level 34) will appear and attack.
Fight Count Draynor. When his health is very low, he will automatically be finished off with the stake.
Once Count Draynor is defeated, the quest is automatically completed.
